item.description:
Boston 9/11 Truth Meet-up
Thursday 6/19
7 - 9
Susan's

122 Westbourne Terrace

Items up for discussion:


9/11 Truth Ad Money Bomb
Serious problems with the Fed
Conspiracy Cafe
Effective response in a crisis

Serious times may be approaching.
Since our own government attacked New York (9/11), Oklahoma and New Orleans as well, the reality is,
our own government is the enemy and face it, Boston could be targeted and hit at any time.
Given this unfortunate reality, it may be advisable to organize to learn how to defend ourselves against
real attack. To prevent a scenario similar to 9/11 happening here,
it may be advisable to get acquainted with volunteer militia in this state.
Some of us may want to volunteer to learn how to help protect the community in the event of a crisis.

Homeland Security forces need to be evicted from this state.
They can't be trusted to to do anything but harm us.

Addressing assaults on our liberties.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Boston 9/11 Truth Meet-up to address serious questions
